name: Into The Deep (Diabolical Arts)
description:
A deep journey into a world of conquest and adventure. Into the Deep combines rogue-like and card game aspects to create a truly unique game. Made from complete scratch by 3 people in  only 70 Hours for K-Jam 2020.

Select your character and jump into the action. All you need to do is click the cards. Be careful, read descriptions. Monsters attack you if you don't kill them with one shot. 

Art - NotManyIdeas

Sound -DeckerTheDude

Code - LaLoge
